raw akas.title: The N&N Files: Nikki and Nora

akas: Nikki & Nora: The N&N Files (original title)
The N&N Files: Nikki and Nora (working title)
akas from release info: Nikki & Nora: The N&N Files (original title)

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Nikki & Nora: The N&N Files (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Nikki and Nora are deep under cover, in hot pursuit, and in search of a quiet moment alone with one another. They're also renovating their house and getting into into snits over 'their' new favorite jacket.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Nikki & Nora: The N&N Files (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Meet the Hewitt who tries to keep Nikki and Nora's finances together while they're off solving crimes, the NOLA police officers who watch their backs, and the grieving girlfriend who hopes Nikki and Nora will take her case.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Nikki & Nora: The N&N Files (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Nikki and Nora dig into the Violet Craig case with a not-so-good friend of Violet and Daniel's, as well as an old flame of Nikki's; the ladies reminisce about their old house; and they explore the roles of their families in their lives.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Nikki & Nora: The N&N Files (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Hewitt scores Nikki and Nora a moment with Daniel's mother; Nora 'parlez-vous francais' to get info from Daniel's former employer (Simon of New Orleans); Mortenberger and Violet give Nikki and Nora new crumbs to follow.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Nikki & Nora: The N&N Files (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: The girls play nice by visiting Nora's mom, but old wounds linger; Arliss shows that he's a fan of all Delaney's; Nikki and Nora finally take Lea out on the town, follow the crumbs to someone who was with Daniel in his final days.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Nikki & Nora: The N&N Files (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot:

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Nikki & Nora: The N&N Files (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Nikki goes undercover as a chantreuse in red, Nora guards Nikki (and every gal at the bar), Handy Joe faces some tough questions, and Violet and Dottie Reid find some peace in the finale of Nikki and Nora, Season 1.

imdb.plot outline: The N&N Files follows New Orleans locals Nikki Beaumont (Liz Vassey) and Nora Delany (Christina Cox) as they juggle the inner-workings of their personal lives with their roles as private investigators in America's oldest party town. Nikki and Nora's unique perspective and sensibility make them perfect investigators for some of the tawdry and unsolved mysteries of the French Quarter, where secret identities threaten to betray carefully crafted public faces and key witnesses won't come forward without the delicate touch of the "velvet hammer." Season One "Music, Mayhem and Mothers" takes Nikki and Nora into the underbelly of the New Orlean's music scene when they're hired to work on a case that puts them in the spotlight and the headlights. In the meantime, at home, Nikki and Nora tackle renovating their house while navigating the rising tide of resurfacing family issues.
